channel.title: Schools Of Business And Management on MicroModa
channel.description: Recent content in Schools Of Business And Management on MicroModa

item.title: American College of Financial Services
item.description: Provides education for Certified Financial Planner, CFP exam preparation, ChFC, CLU, CASL, degrees in financial and insurance services.

item.title: Franklin University
item.description: As an accredited non-profit college in Columbus, OH, Franklin specializes in student success within our online and on-campus bachelors and masters programs.

item.title: Golden Gate University-San Francisco
item.description: Founded in 1901, non-profit Golden Gate University (GGU) offers undergraduate and graduate programs in business and management, taxation, and law.

item.title: Indiana Institute of Technology
item.description: Indiana Tech offers career-oriented degree programs in engineering, business, computer science, criminal justice, education, and more for learners at one of our campuses or online.

item.title: LIM College
item.description: LIM College is exclusively devoted to the business of fashion

item.title: Robert Morris University Illinois
item.description: Official Website of Robert Morris University is a private not-for-profit, regionally accredited university, granting associate degrees, bachelor degrees, and graduate degrees. RMU serves students interested in getting an education that meets the demands of today’s business, graphic arts, health care, culinary and technical world at its main location in Chicago as well as at locations in Arlington Heights, Aurora, Bensenville, Orland Park, Peoria, Schaumburg, Springfield, and Waukegan.

item.title: Southern New Hampshire University
item.description: At Southern New Hampshire University, we believe there are no limits on what you can do, what you can be, or what you can achieve. This is a University that goes the extra mile - so you can too

item.title: Thomas College
item.description: Thomas is committed to your success. The world asks a lot of you in your professional lives, and thats why weâre here to help you meet its changing demands.

item.title: Thunderbird School of Global Management
item.description: Thunderbird School of Global Management is the #1 ranked school in international business education, and is now part of Arizona State University.
